div.p: Aurelius Heras son of Papintos, to Theoâ€”, landowner, greetings. I acknowledge to have received from you from the harvest of the past year six artabas of wheat by the tenth measure, total six artabas of wheat, art. 6. Year 2 of our lord Aurelius Probus Augustus, Hathyr 1. I, Aurelius Silvanus, wrote for him who does not know letters. (O. Pelcer)
